sentences.en: There are fears that the situation might deteriorate into full-scale war.
sentences.cn: 人们担心局势会恶化为全面战争。

sentences.en: Food is apt to deteriorate in summer.
Paintings must have rigid stretchers so that the canvas will be taut, and the paint must not deteriorate, crack, or discolor.
sentences.cn: 画必须有坚硬的画架，这样画布才会绷紧，而且颜料不能变质、开裂或变色。
